title: Nova Vol. 4: Nova Corps (Trade Paperback)
description:
Could it be…the return of the Nova Corps? Will things ever be the same for Richard Rider? What is the Worldmind up to, and what will it mean for the future of the Human Rocket and the Nova Corps itself?! Cosmic fans will not want to miss this status-quo-changing chapter of the series Ain't It Cool News calls "Brilliant. Just brilliant." Also, see how it all began in Nova’s power-packed origin, complete with the classic tale plus a brand new framing sequence. Collecting NOVA #19-22 and NOVA: ORIGIN OF RICHARD RIDER
Rated T+ …$14.99
ISBN 978-0-7851-3188-5
